content: AC-D MD Metal deck cutting disc Metal deck cutting disc for gas saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed to make cutting through metal deck with gas cut-off saws quicker and easier Thanks to its premium grain and bond system, the disc is fast, free-cutting, strong and durable Applications Cutting metal decks with gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Metal deck Tool type: Gas saw Blade / disc thickness: 0.156 in Technical Data | Base material | Metal deck | Tool type | Gas saw ### ITEMS- 436714 - Cutting disc 12x5/32x20 MD SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 436718 - Cutting disc 12x5/32x1 MD SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 436716 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x20 MD SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 436720 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x1 MD SPX - Package Size 10 pc
